entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -28.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
